name: Docker Compose - Loki/Promtail/Grafana
description: Loki + Promtail + Grafana のログ観測スタック（簡易）。

files.template:
version: '3.9'
services:
  loki:
    image: grafana/loki:2.9.0
    ports: ['3100:3100']
  promtail:
    image: grafana/promtail:2.9.0
    command: ['-config.file=/etc/promtail/config.yml']
  grafana:
    image: grafana/grafana:10.4.0
    ports: ['3000:3000']
    depends_on: [loki]
